text: , also known as , is a Japanese video game publisher, developer, and distributor.Tecmo Koei America Corp., "Company" ; retrieved 2012-3-16. ==History== In 2009, Koei merged with a competitor, Tecmo.Ellison, Blake, "Tecmo and Koei to Merge in April 2009," Shacknews. The new company was named Tecmo Koei.Kotaku.com, "Koei Tecmo Reveals Its New Company Logo (Looks Familiar)"; retrieved 2012-3-16. ==References== Category:Video game companies of Japan
